On Feb 21, 2007, at 6:51 PM, Nick Gall wrote:

>
> --- In rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com, Edward Summers <ehs@...> wrote:
> >
> > Funny, I'm just now in the process of formulating a simple
> > demonstration of how to manage bibliographic metadata with APP. Has
> > anyone else documented their use of APP for non-blogging  
> applications
> > anywhere? I have run across gdata and pipes--what are the other
> > prominent implementations?
> >
> > //Ed
> >
> Not an implementation--yet--just a recommendation to implement:  
> Intelligence Community Moving Toward Atom. -- Nick
